name: Amazing Computer Workshop
description:
Welcome to your Amazing Computer Workshop or ACW. In this idle clicker game you will have to build and sell computers, hire builders and buy more shops to expand your activity!

THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND THERE IS STILL SOME BUGS! ONE OF THEM DOESN'T LET YOU PLAY THE GAME WITH SOME ANTIVIRUS PROGRAMS, SO BEFORE YOU LAUNCH IT DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS!
